name: Boostly
all_locations: Lehi, UT, USA; Orem, UT, USA
long_description:
Boostly is an SMS marketing hub for restaurants. For example, restaurants use Boostly to build a CRM for both their online & offline customers, and then Boostly uses SMS marketing to automatically market to customers based on their engagement with the brand.

Boostly also provides an automated phone assistant which handles call-in orders without staff intervention, improving efficiency and maximizing revenue, and then automatically engages the restaurantâ€™s customers through SMS marketing to drive additional future orders.

Boostly also collects feedback on the guest experience, enabling the restaurant to resolve issues in real-time and generate reviews.
one_liner: The SMS marketing hub for restaurants
